title: Canadian Energy Stocks Climb to First Record Since 2008
description: Canadian energy shares had their first record close in nearly eighteen years, helped by rising oil and natural gas prices and a return of investor interest in the sector.
content: Canadian energy shares had their first record close in nearly eighteen years, helped by rising oil and natural gas prices and a return of investor interest in the sector.
